name: Ekla Cholo Re
introduction: "Ekla Cholo Re" is an iconic Bengali song written and composed by Rabindranath Tagore, the renowned Indian poet, philosopher, and Nobel laureate. The title translates to "Walk Alone" in English. This song is celebrated for its powerful message of self-reliance, courage, and perseverance in the face of adversity. It encourages individuals to continue on their chosen path even when others may not join or support them. The song has become deeply ingrained in Bengali culture and has been widely adopted across India as an anthem of personal strength and social reform.

song.BN: যদি তোর ডাক শুনে কেউ না আসে
song.EN: jodi tor dak shune keu na ashe
song.trivia: This song gained national popularity after it was featured in the film Kahaani starring Vidya Balan. The film was also based in Kolkata.
Re is almost an untranslatable word in English, but it roughly translates to hey or oh

song.BN: যদি তোর ডাক শুনে কেউ না আসে তবে একলা চলো রে
song.EN: jodi tor dak shune keu na ashe tobe ekla cholo re
song.trivia: This song was written at Giridih town in modern-day Jharkhand. It became one of the key songs for the Anti-Partition Movement in Bengal Presidency in 1905, and was one of Gandhiji's favorite songs.

song.BN: ওরে ও অভাগা, যদি কেউ কথা না কয়
song.EN: ore o abhaga jodi keu katha na kohe

song.trivia: Jodi Shobai thake mukh phiraye literally means 'If everybody stays face-turned'

song.BN: যদি সবাই থাকে মুখ ফেরায় সবাই করে ভয়
song.EN: jodi shobai thake mukh phiraye shobai kore bhoy

song.trivia: this sentence literally means 'then, having bared your soul' or in Hindi 'tab apne praan ko khol kar'

song.BN: ও তুই মুখ ফুটে তোর মনের কথা একলা বলো রে
song.EN: o tui mukh phote tor moner katha ekla bolo re
song.trivia: O is a poetic way in Bengali to say 'and'
dhore literally means holds, so 'if nobody holds light'

song.BN: ওরে ওরে ও অভাগা, যদি আলো না ধরে
song.EN: ore ore o abhaga, jodi alo na dhare

song.trivia: this phrase literally means -- they give (দেয়/dey) door (দুয়ার/duaar) in house (ঘরে/ghore). In bengali, 'to give door' is a way of saying to lock the house.

song.BN: যদি ঝড়-বাদলে আঁধার রাতে দুয়ার দেয় ঘরে
song.EN: Jodi jhor-badole adhar rate duar dae ghore

song.trivia: Bajranole is a combination of Bajra (lightning) and Anal (fire). Thus, Bajranal means lightning fire and Bajranale means with the lightning fire

song.BN: আপন বুকের পাঁজর জ্বালিয়ে নিয়ে একলা জ্বলো রে
song.EN: apon buker panjor jaliye niye ekla jolo re
song.trivia: Buker Panjor means rib-cage. Buk means heart, Buker means heart's and Panjor means cage.

song.BN: যদি তোর ডাক শুনে কেউ না আসে তবে একলা চলো রে
song.EN: Jodi tor dak shune keu na eshe tobe ekla cholo re
